definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon
lit. to meet face to face on a narrow path (idiom)/fig. enemies or rivals meet face to face

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

sentences.english: They were destined never to meet again.
sentences.chinese: 命运注定他们永不再相逢。

sentences.english: Comes face to face with an adversary the brave victory, now judges true brave to be also too early.
sentences.chinese: 狭路相逢勇者胜，现在来判断真正的勇者还为时过早。

sentences.english: Perhaps we have the fortune, to meet one day. There's no need for any reticence .
sentences.chinese: 也许我们有缘，相逢某一天，一见如故无庸讳言。

sentences.english: Yesterday although dissipated, distinguishes to meet by chance difficultly, how can forget your affection.
sentences.chinese: 昨天虽已消逝，分别难相逢，怎能忘记你的一片深情。

sentences.english: We are met on a great battle field of that war.
sentences.chinese: 吾等现相逢于此战中一处浩大战场。

sentences.english: She was five years ago, and Lee Hyun-Prince Edward meet by chance, love at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 她五年前和李贤太子萍水相逢，一见钟情。

sentences.english: Wife are empty, son of space, would not meet the Styx.
sentences.chinese: 妻也空，子也空，黄泉路上不相逢。

sentences.english: "How can? We barely know each other. " she said.
sentences.chinese: “可是我们，只是萍水相逢吧”她说。

sentences.english: His hand and shoulder were twitching from the unlooked-for contact.
sentences.chinese: 由于这不期而遇的相逢，他的手和肩部在抽搐。

sentences.english: They meet at certain moral limits.
sentences.chinese: 两者在某个道德底线相逢。

sentences.english: During the night, they gather to pray in congregation and listen to lectures from Muslim scholars.
sentences.chinese: 夜间，他们为集体拜和聆听穆斯林学者演讲而相逢。

sentences.english: If I should meet thee, After long years, How should I greet thee?
sentences.chinese: 多年离别后，抑或再相逢，相逢何所语？

sentences.english: If I should meet thee, After long years, How should I greet thee?
sentences.chinese: 多年离别后，抑或再相逢，相逢何所语？

sentences.english: Blow out the red dust, but can not scatter to meet.
sentences.chinese: 吹尽了滚滚红尘，却吹不散弹指的相逢。

definition: to see each other/to meet in person
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
to meet again after a long period of separation
meet by chance/have a chance encounter
to meet by chance/to run into sb/chance encounter
